title: How to Make Apple Pie (Party Drink)

steps.headline: Pour in the juice, cider, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon sticks into the pot.
Heat up over low heat to boiling.
steps.description: Let boil until the cinnamon sticks open up and unroll.

steps.headline: Take pot off heat and set on the counter on a cooling rack.
steps.description: Pour in your liquor once lukewarm.

steps.headline: Using a funnel pour off the liquid into mason jars.
steps.description: If you like a lot of cinnamon taste you can place a fresh cinnamon stick in the mason jar.

text: Pour in the juice, cider, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon sticks into the pot.  Heat up over low heat to boiling. Let boil until the cinnamon sticks open up and unroll. Take pot off heat and set on the counter on a cooling rack. Pour in your liquor once lukewarm. Using a funnel pour off the liquid into mason jars. If you like a lot of cinnamon taste you can place a fresh cinnamon stick in the mason jar. Finished.
